Reservoir Model.description: 1: Multiple parallel fractures model, 2: 1D linear heat sweep model,  3: m/a single fracture drawdown model, 4: Linear thermal drawdown model, 5: Generic user-provided temperature profile, 6: TOUGH2

Maximum Temperature.description: Maximum allowable reservoir temperature (e.g. due to drill bit or logging tools constraints). GEOPHIRES will cap the drilling depth to stay below this maximum temperature.

Number of Segments.description: Number of rock segments from surface to reservoir depth with specific geothermal gradient

Reservoir Volume Option.description: Specifies how the reservoir volume, and fracture distribution (for reservoir models 1 and 2) are calculated. The reservoir volume is used by GEOPHIRES to estimate the stored heat in place. The fracture distribution is needed as input for the EGS fracture-based reservoir models 1 and 2: Specify number of fractures and fracture separation, 2: Specify reservoir volume and fracture separation, 3: Specify reservoir volume and number of fractures, 4: Specify reservoir volume only (sufficient for reservoir models 3, 4, 5 and 6)

Fracture Shape.description: Specifies the shape of the (identical) fractures in a fracture-based reservoir: 1: Circular fracture with known area, 2: Circular fracture with known diameter, 3: Square fracture, 4: Rectangular fracture

Fracture Area.description: Effective heat transfer area per fracture

Fracture Height.description: Diameter (if fracture shape = 2) or height (if fracture shape = 3 or 4) of each fracture

Number of Fractures.description: Number of identical parallel fractures in EGS fracture-based reservoir model.

Fracture Separation.description: Separation of identical parallel fractures with uniform spatial distribution in EGS fracture-based reservoir

Water Loss Fraction.description: Fraction of water lost in the reservoir defined as (total geofluid lost)/(total geofluid produced).

Reservoir Heat Capacity.description: Constant and uniform reservoir rock heat capacity

Reservoir Density.description: Constant and uniform reservoir rock density

Reservoir Thermal Conductivity.description: Constant and uniform reservoir rock thermal conductivity

Surface Temperature.description: Surface temperature used for calculating bottom-hole temperature (with geothermal gradient and reservoir depth)

Drawdown Parameter.description: specify the thermal drawdown for reservoir model 3 and 4

Production Well Diameter.description: Inner diameter of production wellbore (assumed constant along the wellbore) to calculate frictional pressure drop and wellbore heat transmission with Rameys model

Injection Well Diameter.description: Inner diameter of production wellbore (assumed constant along the wellbore) to calculate frictional pressure drop and wellbore heat transmission with Rameys model

Ramey Production Wellbore Model.description: Select whether to use Rameys model to estimate the geofluid temperature drop in the production wells

Production Wellbore Temperature Drop.description: Specify constant production well geofluid temperature drop in case Rameys model is disabled.

Injection Wellbore Temperature Gain.description: Specify constant injection well geofluid temperature gain.

Production Flow Rate per Well.description: Geofluid flow rate per production well.

Reservoir Impedance.description: Reservoir resistance to flow per well-pair. For EGS-type reservoirs when the injection well is in hydraulic communication with the production well, this parameter specifies the overall pressure drop in the reservoir between injection well and production well (see docs)

Well Separation.description: Well separation for built-in TOUGH2 doublet reservoir model

Injection Temperature.description: Constant geofluid injection temperature at injection wellhead.

Reservoir Hydrostatic Pressure.description: Reservoir hydrostatic far-field pressure.  Default value is calculated with built-in modified Xie-Bloomfield-Shook equation (DOE, 2016).

Production Wellhead Pressure.description: Constant production wellhead pressure; Required if specifying productivity index

Injectivity Index.description: Injectivity index defined as ratio of injection well flow rate over injection well outflow pressure drop (flowing bottom hole pressure - hydrostatic reservoir pressure).

Productivity Index.description: Productivity index defined as ratio of production well flow rate over production well inflow pressure drop (see docs)

Maximum Drawdown.description: Maximum allowable thermal drawdown before redrilling of all wells into new reservoir (most applicable to EGS-type reservoirs with heat farming strategies). E.g. a value of 0.2 means that all wells are redrilled after the production temperature (at the wellhead) has dropped by 20% of its initial temperature

Is AGS.description: Set to true if the model is for an Advanced Geothermal System (AGS)

End-Use Option.description: Select the end-use application of the geofluid heat (see docs for details)

Power Plant Type.description: Specify the type of power plant in case of electricity generation. 1: Subcritical ORC, 2: Supercritical ORC, 3: Single-flash, 4: Double-flash

Circulation Pump Efficiency.description: Specify the overall efficiency of the injection and production well pumps

Utilization Factor.description: Ratio of the time the plant is running in normal production in a 1-year time period.

End-Use Efficiency Factor.description: Constant thermal efficiency of the direct-use application

CHP Fraction.description: Fraction of produced geofluid flow rate going to direct-use heat application in CHP parallel cycle

CHP Bottoming Entering Temperature.description: Power plant entering geofluid temperature used in CHP bottoming cycle

Ambient Temperature.description: Ambient (or dead-state) temperature used for calculating power plant utilization efficiency

Plant Outlet Pressure.description: Constant plant outlet pressure equal to injection well pump(s) suction pressure

Electricity Rate.description: Price of electricity to calculate pumping costs in direct-use heat only mode or revenue from electricity sales in CHP mode.

Heat Rate.description: Price of heat to calculate revenue from heat sales in CHP mode.

Economic Model.description: Specify the economic model to calculate the levelized cost of energy. 1: Fixed Charge Rate Model, 2: Standard Levelized Cost Model, 3: BICYCLE Levelized Cost Model, 4: CLGS

Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost Adjus.description: Multiplier for built-in reservoir stimulation capital cost correlation

Exploration Capital Cost Adjustment Fact.description: Multiplier for built-in exploration capital cost correlation

Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.description: Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cost
Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cost Adjustment Factor

Wellfield O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.description: Multiplier for built-in wellfield O&M cost correlation

Surface Plant Capital Cost Adjustment Fa.description: Multiplier for built-in surface plant capital cost correlation

Field Gathering System Capital Cost.description: Total field gathering system capital cost

Field Gathering System Capital Cost Adju.description: Multiplier for built-in field gathering system capital cost correlation

Surface Plant O&M Cost.description: Total annual surface plant O&M cost

Surface Plant O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.description: Multiplier for built-in surface plant O&M cost correlation

Water Cost Adjustment Factor.description: Multiplier for built-in make-up water cost correlation

Time steps per year.description: Number of internal simulation time steps per year

Fixed Charge Rate.description: Fixed charge rate (FCR) used in the Fixed Charge Rate Model

Discount Rate.description: Discount rate used in the Standard Levelized Cost Model

Fraction of Investment in Bonds.description: Fraction of geothermal project financing through bonds (see docs)

Well Drilling Cost Correlation.description: Select the built-in horizontal well drilling and completion cost correlation. 1: vertical open-hole, small diameter; 2: deviated liner, small diameter; 3: vertical open-hole, large diameter; 4: deviated liner, large diameter; 5: Simple - user specified cost per meter

Do AddOn Calculations.description: Set to true if you want the add-on economics calculations to be made

Do CCUS Calculations.description: Set to true if you want the CCUS economics calculations to be made

All-in Vertical Drilling Costs.description: Set user specified all-in cost per meter of vertical drilling, including drilling, casing, cement, insulated insert

All-in Nonvertical Drilling Costs.description: Set user specified all-in cost per meter of non-vertical drilling, including drilling, casing, cement, insulated insert
